languages.text: "Эта байка обладала удивительной телесностью... Кем бы ни был этот мерзавец в алом платке, назвался он именно так. И он весьма дерзновенно отзывался о Вашей Светлости".
"This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Эта байка обладала удивительной телесностью... Кем бы ни был этот мерзавец в алом платке, назвался он именно так. И он весьма дерзновенно отзывался о Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: "This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality ... Whoever the scoundrel in the scarlet scarf was, he called himself that. And spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality ... Whoever the scoundrel in the scarlet scarf was, he called himself that. And spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: "Dieses Ammenmärchen war mit erstaunlicher Körperlichkeit gesegnet ... Wer immer dieser Mistkerl mit dem roten Schal war, er nannte sich so und sprach sehr abwertend von Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Ammenmärchen war mit erstaunlicher Körperlichkeit gesegnet ... Wer immer dieser Mistkerl mit dem roten Schal war, er nannte sich so und sprach sehr abwertend von Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: «Pues ese cuento de viejas se ha manifestado físicamente... Quienquiera que fuese el bastardo del pañuelo rojo, respondía a tal nombre y habló con gran impertinencia de mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Pues ese cuento de viejas se ha manifestado físicamente... Quienquiera que fuese el bastardo del pañuelo rojo, respondía a tal nombre y habló con gran impertinencia de mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: 「この昔話は驚くほど物質的に恵まれていまして…赤いスカーフの輩が何者か関係なく、通り名を持っていて、陛下の無礼な話をしているのです」
languages.original_text: "This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「この昔話は驚くほど物質的に恵まれていまして…赤いスカーフの輩が何者か関係なく、通り名を持っていて、陛下の無礼な話をしているのです」

languages.text: “那群蠢货编出来的故事恐怕已经成真了……虽然不知道那个戴着红头巾的人是谁，但他自称叫涅墨斯特，还以非常无礼的方式称呼您，大人。”
languages.original_text: "This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “那群蠢货编出来的故事恐怕已经成真了……虽然不知道那个戴着红头巾的人是谁，但他自称叫涅墨斯特，还以非常无礼的方式称呼您，大人。”

languages.text: « Un vieux conte de bonne femme tout ce qu'il y a de plus réel, alors... Qui qu'il soit, c'est ainsi que ce fumier enturbanné se fait appeler, et il a parlé de Votre Seigneurie en des termes très irrespectueux. »
languages.original_text: "This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Un vieux conte de bonne femme tout ce qu'il y a de plus réel, alors... Qui qu'il soit, c'est ainsi que ce fumier enturbanné se fait appeler, et il a parlé de Votre Seigneurie en des termes très irrespectueux. »

languages.text: "Bu kocakarı hikâyesi, fiziksel bir hâl almış durumda. Kızıl atkılı şerefsiz her kim ise bu ismi kullanıyordu ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri hakkında edepsizce konuşuyordu."
languages.original_text: "This old wives' tale was blessed with amazing corporeality... Whoever the bastard in the red scarf was, he went by that name, and spoke very impertinently of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
